Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The findings in this family suggest that delGAG291 is part of the cause of Japanese ALD with phenotypic variations .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Japanese ALD |

Explanation:

* Japanese ALD: This is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a genetic disorder also known as X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy (X-ALD), which is prevalent in the Japanese population.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Japanese ALD |

Explanation:

* Japanese ALD: This is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a genetic disorder also known as X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy (X-ALD), which is prevalent in the Japanese population.

The other term, "delGAG291," is not a disease entity. It is a genetic mutation or variation associated with the disease Japanese ALD.
